name: paella-player
description: PaellaPlayer is a set of libraries to create a multi stream video player. This is the central repository that groups all Paella Player packages, which is divided into several libraries:

scripts.dev: npm run -w repos/paella-core dev & npm run -w repos/paella-basic-plugins dev & npm run -w repos/paella-slide-plugins dev & npm run -w repos/paella-user-tracking dev & npm run -w repos/paella-video-plugins dev & npm run -w repos/paella-webgl-plugins dev & npm run -w repos/paella-zoom-plugin dev & npm run -w samples/development-player-ts dev & npm run -w repos/paella-onboarding-plugin dev & npm run -w repos/paella-cookieconsent-plugin dev & npm run -w repos/paella-ai-plugins dev
scripts.ts-build: npm run -w repos/paella-core -w repos/paella-basic-plugins -w repos/paella-slide-plugins -w repos/paella-user-tracking -w repos/paella-video-plugins -w repos/paella-webgl-plugins -w repos/paella-zoom-plugin -w repos/paella-cookieconsenr-plugin -w repos/paella-onboarding-plugin -w repos/paella-cookieconsent-plugin -w repos/paella-ai-plugins build
